   uint64_t   size:16

   uint64_t   addr:42
} s

Detailed Description

pko buf ptr This is good for LINK_S, GATHER_S and PKI_BUFLINK_S structure use.

It can also be used for JUMP_S with F-bit represented by "i" field, and the size limited to 8-bit.
